bibl.title: Equal in Honor to the First Friends.
bibl.note: The designation ἰσότιμος (τῶν ἰσοτίμων) τοῖς πρώτοις φίλοις in the papyri, the inscriptions from Egypt, and the inscriptions from Cyprus. The papyrological data suggest its use only in the years 142 to 136 B.C.
bibl.seg: OATES John F., Equal in Honor to the First Friends.

The designation ἰσότιμος (τῶν ἰσοτίμων) τοῖς πρώτοις φίλοις in the papyri, the inscriptions from Egypt, and the inscriptions from Cyprus. The papyrological data suggest its use only in the years 142 to 136 B.C.
